description: Build a text editor widget for the dashboard that saves notes to coderef/notes/ using the existing hybrid-router pattern (Web FS Access + API fallback). Extend /api/coderef/file or create /api/coderef/notes route with server-side path restrictions. Match industrial theme tokens. Include auto-save, size limits, and .txt/.md/.json file support.
goal: Add functionality - Create a notes editor widget that follows existing architectural patterns (hybrid-router + api-access) without adding new Electron IPC
requirements: Styling (match industrial theme with global CSS tokens)
constraints: Use hybrid-router pattern (Web FS Access + API fallback)
No new Electron IPC (extend existing API routes)
Restrict writes to coderef/notes/ only (server-side validation)
